languages.text: "Деньгами не купить новую голову взамен простреленной. Ты предлагаешь нам узаконить опасный прецедент. Вкладываешь в руки гранату, украшенную самоцветами... шерин". {n}От вашего внимания не укрывается, как вздрагивают плечи Джай при последнем слове Пощады.{/n}

"Money can't buy a new head to replace one that's full of bullets. You're asking us to set a dangerous precedent. You are putting a bejewelled grenade in our hands... shereen." {n}You do not fail to notice the way Jae's shoulders shudder at Mercy's last word.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Деньгами не купить новую голову взамен простреленной. Ты предлагаешь нам узаконить опасный прецедент. Вкладываешь в руки гранату, украшенную самоцветами... шерин". {n}От вашего внимания не укрывается, как вздрагивают плечи Джай при последнем слове Пощады.{/n}

traits.speaker: Mercy

traits.locale_text: "Money can't buy a new head to replace one that's full of bullets. You're asking us to set a dangerous precedent. You are putting a bejewelled grenade in our hands... shereen." {n}You do not fail to notice the way Jae's shoulders shudder at Mercy's last word.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: “要是脑袋被打成了筛子，哪怕有再多的钱，也买不来新的脑袋。你这是在要求我们开创一个危险的先河。你这是把一枚镶满了珠宝的手榴弹，交到了我们手中……亲爱的。”{n}你看得很清楚，悯慈说出最后三个字的时候，婕伊的肩膀颤抖了一下。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Money can't buy a new head to replace one that's full of bullets. You're asking us to set a dangerous precedent. You are putting a bejewelled grenade in our hands... shereen." {n}You do not fail to notice the way Jae's shoulders shudder at Mercy's last word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “要是脑袋被打成了筛子，哪怕有再多的钱，也买不来新的脑袋。你这是在要求我们开创一个危险的先河。你这是把一枚镶满了珠宝的手榴弹，交到了我们手中……亲爱的。”{n}你看得很清楚，悯慈说出最后三个字的时候，婕伊的肩膀颤抖了一下。{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: 「弾丸でいっぱいになった頭の代わりに、新しい頭をお金で買うことはできない。お前は我らに危険な前例を作れと言っている。お前は宝石をちりばめた手榴弾を私たちの手に握らせようとしているのだ…シャリーン」{n}マーシーの最後の言葉にジェイが肩を震わせたのを、あなたは見逃さなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Money can't buy a new head to replace one that's full of bullets. You're asking us to set a dangerous precedent. You are putting a bejewelled grenade in our hands... shereen." {n}You do not fail to notice the way Jae's shoulders shudder at Mercy's last word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「弾丸でいっぱいになった頭の代わりに、新しい頭をお金で買うことはできない。お前は我らに危険な前例を作れと言っている。お前は宝石をちりばめた手榴弾を私たちの手に握らせようとしているのだ…シャリーン」{n}マーシーの最後の言葉にジェイが肩を震わせたのを、あなたは見逃さなかった。{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: «El dinero no puede comprar una cabeza nueva para sustituir una llena de balas. Estás estableciendo un precedente peligroso al dejar esta granada enjoyada en nuestras manos... shereen». {n}El estremecimiento de los hombros de Jae al oír esta última palabra de labios de Mercy no pasa desapercibido.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Money can't buy a new head to replace one that's full of bullets. You're asking us to set a dangerous precedent. You are putting a bejewelled grenade in our hands... shereen." {n}You do not fail to notice the way Jae's shoulders shudder at Mercy's last word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «El dinero no puede comprar una cabeza nueva para sustituir una llena de balas. Estás estableciendo un precedente peligroso al dejar esta granada enjoyada en nuestras manos... shereen». {n}El estremecimiento de los hombros de Jae al oír esta última palabra de labios de Mercy no pasa desapercibido.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: « Même avec tout l'or du monde, on ne rachète pas une tête pour en remplacer une autre criblée de balles. Tu nous demandes d'accepter un dangereux précédent. Tu places une grenade richement ornée entre nos mains... shereen. » {n}Vous ne manquez pas de remarquer que les épaules de Jae tremblent lorsqu'elle entend ce dernier mot.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Money can't buy a new head to replace one that's full of bullets. You're asking us to set a dangerous precedent. You are putting a bejewelled grenade in our hands... shereen." {n}You do not fail to notice the way Jae's shoulders shudder at Mercy's last word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Même avec tout l'or du monde, on ne rachète pas une tête pour en remplacer une autre criblée de balles. Tu nous demandes d'accepter un dangereux précédent. Tu places une grenade richement ornée entre nos mains... shereen. » {n}Vous ne manquez pas de remarquer que les épaules de Jae tremblent lorsqu'elle entend ce dernier mot.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: "Mit Geld lassen sich keine neuen Köpfe kaufen, um von Kugeln durchlöcherte zu ersetzen. Was Ihr hier verlangt, schafft einen gefährlichen Präzedenzfall. Was Ihr uns anbietet, ist eine von Juwelen besetzte Granate ... Shereen." {n}Dir entgeht nicht, wie Jae bei Mercys letztem Wort zusammenzuckt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Money can't buy a new head to replace one that's full of bullets. You're asking us to set a dangerous precedent. You are putting a bejewelled grenade in our hands... shereen." {n}You do not fail to notice the way Jae's shoulders shudder at Mercy's last word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Mit Geld lassen sich keine neuen Köpfe kaufen, um von Kugeln durchlöcherte zu ersetzen. Was Ihr hier verlangt, schafft einen gefährlichen Präzedenzfall. Was Ihr uns anbietet, ist eine von Juwelen besetzte Granate ... Shereen." {n}Dir entgeht nicht, wie Jae bei Mercys letztem Wort zusammenzuckt.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: "Kurşunla dolu bir kafanın yerini alacak yeni kafa, parayla satın alınamaz. Bizden tehlikeli bir emsal meydana getirmemizi istiyorsun. Ellerimize mücevherlerle bezeli bir bomba tutuşturuyorsun... Şirinim." {n}Merhamet'in son sözünün Jae'ın omuzlarını titrettiği, gözünden kaçmıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Money can't buy a new head to replace one that's full of bullets. You're asking us to set a dangerous precedent. You are putting a bejewelled grenade in our hands... shereen." {n}You do not fail to notice the way Jae's shoulders shudder at Mercy's last word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Kurşunla dolu bir kafanın yerini alacak yeni kafa parayla satın alınamaz. Bizden tehlikeli bir emsal meydana getirmemizi istiyorsun. Ellerimize mücevherlerle bezeli bir bomba tutuşturuyorsun... Şirinim." {n}Merhamet'in son sözcüğünün, Jae'ın omuzlarını titrettiği gözünden kaçmıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy
